text:
The invention of the telephone and then smartphone or mobile phone is very interesting. Indeed, it is already a medium of communication but his functions are not like before. Indeed, it was the first technology that we use to call someone or just to talk with someone and to have relationship without a real person behind us. Moreover, his first utilisation was not like today, it was to talk with a person whan this one was not here, or, today it's not the same thing. Actually, people are not on their phones to talk someone or just with the "chat" but less with real "call". During the World War II, he was generally used in military section to know enemies's positions and inform the country or members of power. Then after many years, these telephones have been installed in citizens's houses, but it is not like today. Before, there was one phone for one family and he was fixed, or now it is one phone for one person. This is a great evolution. We passed to a technology that was used for military services at  a technology that we used already today and in general, lots of people have a smartphone or a mobile phone with us.
 I think that this evolution, or invention was one of the best technology. Today, we cannot imagine work without a telephone or a mobile phone. But, has many technology, there was negative points. Indeed, a lot of children are on technology everyday and we know that it is not good for them. Moreover, personally, it is the same thing, i use my phone all the time because it is my object of work.
